CHOCOLATE BUTTERCREAM FROSTING *(Hershey Food Corp.)*
6 tbsp butter or margarine, softened
1/2 cup Hershey's Cocoa
2 2/3 cup powdered sugar, sifted
1/3 cup milk
1 tsp vanilla

Cream butter or margarine in small mixer bowl. Add cocoa and powdered sugar alternately with milk.
Beat to spreading consistency *(an additional tablespoon of milk may be needed)*. Blend in vanilla. Enough
for tops and sides of two 8 inch layers.

CREAM CHEESE FROSTING
3 oz cream cheese, at room temperature
4 tbsp margarine, softened
2 cups powdered sugar, sifted
1 tsp vanilla

With an electric mixer combine cream cheese, margarine and vanilla, beating until fluffy. Add powdered
sugar gradually and continue beating until smooth and creamy. Enough for two 9-inch layer tops or one 9
inch layer top and side.

FLUFFY UNCOOKED FROSTING
1 egg white, thoroughly chilled
1 cup granulated sugar
1/4 tsp cream of tartar
1/2 cup boiling water
1/2 tsp vanilla

Combine in a large mixer bowl, egg white, sugar and cream of tartar. Add boiling water and at once begin
beating with mixer until thick and fluffy. Add vanilla. Makes enough for tops and sides of two 9-inch layers.
name: Frostings I
